Html:
Hi!
First of all thanks for making this great app. for WoW although I have a few questions:
I was wondering if I could somehow delete the (currently not obtainable) epic gems from the software as I could get a more accurate results for my dps and proper gear without them?
I'd also like to know if I have 3/4 T7 (ret pala) and want to get the 4th part does the software count in the 4-set bonus to my dps or only the 4th part's stats?
I'm unsure about the hit rating as well, I used to have 300+ but now with an item change I have 220 and Rawr says that 80 hit rating is hardly making any difference in my dps... can this be true?

You can do a mass replacement of all gems in items with different gems that you prefer (ie, superior instead of epic quality ones). See Tools > Set Default Gems.
Yes, set bonuses are considered when comparing items.
Not sure of the calculations involved here, but last I saw, hit wasn't the most valuable stat for Retadins (str was), so it's not impossible for an item swap to lose 80 hit and still be a net gain in DPS. Err, actually, isn't that way over the hit cap? Isn't the hit cap for Retadins like 165 or something like that?
No, it's 296 atm as Blizzard removed the precision talent which gave us +3%.

Keep in mind there is a bug right now that effects some rets that gives them a free 4% chance to hit. Which would make both of you correct. Not all pallies have the bugged hit so keeping it at 296 as a base with a way to modify it for the free 4% hit would be better.

keep in mind while hit is a lesser valued stat if you miss a judgement due to lack of hit there are far bigger concerns than lack dps over a longer fight due to the fact you recieved no mana back through JotW. Keep that in mind when evaluating hit.
